reviews.text: Our stay with SuitsRus in one of their Belgium properties was absolutely fantastic. The property itself was spotless, beautifully maintained, and incredibly comfortable. Communication was outstanding from the start. A special shoutout to Gaurav, who went above and beyond to assist us with a late checkout. Highly recommend SuitsRus for anyone looking for a reliable, clean, and stress-free stay.

My family and I enjoyed our stay; the location was within walking distance of Antwerp Central and less than a 10-minute drive away. There was a JUMBO supermarket nearby. The hosts Nishita and Gaurav are very responsive and friendly. Highly recommend.
Super apartment, close to the city. Very clean and spacious. Great service and contact with the host. I would recommend this apartment to everybody and for sure come back.

This apartment is spectacular and great value for money. Clean, fresh, modern, well designed with top floor luxuries. The rooftop views are breathtaking from all 3 balconies. Our dogs were welcomed. Highly recommended and we will definitely return.

Quiet neighborhood. Tram, supermarket, and small grocery store are around the corner. Modern building with elevator. Convenient self check-in/out. Good soundproofing. Clean, fresh looking apartment with everything a tourist may need. Comfortable shower. Beautiful terrace. Overall recommended.
The accommodation was nice. The staff, especially Gaurav, was very helpful and responsive. He helped to modify booking and provided the late checkout we needed.
The apartment is beautiful and in an amazing location. It has everything we need and is spacious. The host is easy to get hold of and sort things out. We will definitely stay here again.

We stayed for two weeks. The location is close to Antwerp Central station and tram stations. The hosts were friendly and helped quickly. The only improvement would be having cleaning supplies if you stay longer than one week. Overall, we really enjoyed our stay.

The apartment is superb, absolutely clean and designed. Big windows, street view. Gaurav and Tina were super helpful. The kitchen is spacious. The big bathroom is luxurious. The bed is comfy and the sheets are brand new. We would definitely stay again.
An amazing apartment, very well equipped and clean with all needed amenities. Beautiful balcony, TV with Netflix and internet. Great location. The host was very helpful. Highly recommended.
Great apartment with amenities, central and close to supermarket, parking available on request. Gaurav is attentive. This is our third time staying there.
We had a great stay. Great location, very convenient for tram and the city. Apartment was spacious and clean with a very attentive host.
Very nice apartment, clean and spacious. Good location accessible by public transport. The host helped with required facilities. Overall a wonderful stay.
Very nice and beautiful house, everything was clean and new. Located close to central station. We enjoyed our stay and the host was always on call.
Nice apartment, great location, very helpful host.
We are very happy with our accommodation. Everything you need and a basic but good equipped kitchen. Spacious and enough room for up to 4 people.
Great location. Beautiful apartment decorated in a modern way. Staff is very helpful. Highly recommend.
We really enjoyed the apartment. It looked like the photos. The beds were very comfy. The hosts are very responsive.
Very spacious apartment, interesting room layout, large bathroom with bathtub and shower and a large kitchen area. Close to the center, quiet neighborhood. Very good and quick contact with the host.
Modern and spacious apartment close to the city center. Rooms are very clean. Parking is available. Hosts are always ready to help. Check-in is uncomplicated.
The apartment was very comfortable and modern. Customer service was quick to respond. There is a washing machine and balcony. Lights have modes for Shabbat and Yom Tov and a normal key is available.
The stay was amazing. The apartment itself is superb. Everything is clean and modern and there are three roof terraces. Communication is good and responsive.
We had a great stay. Key handover and communication were uncomplicated. The apartment was very clean, spacious and high quality furnished. The location is central but quiet.
Very nice, clean and modern apartment. Perfect location for a city trip. Excellent host. Clean, good location, affordable, great service.
We had a very pleasant stay. Quick assistance with check-in despite our late arrival.
All was very clean, good location nearby supermarkets and public transport. Good and fast reply from the host.
Great place to stay in Antwerp. Luxury apartment and close to all the hotspots. The host was really helpful.
We stayed in a clean 3 bedroom apartment. The bathrooms were very nice and clean. It is located in a quiet neighborhood, but not far away from the city. Check-in and check-out were easy.
We had a great time in the apartment. We were five and there was enough space. Contact was nice and responsive. Everything was nice and beautiful and close to the city and grocery store.
We had a great weekend in Antwerp. Apartment was very comfortable, convenient check in and location walking distance to the city highlights.
We were with a group of friends and enjoyed the accommodation so much. Check-in was automatic and contact was really nice.
Great apartment, couple minutes from tram where you can get to the center. The host helped with check-in.
Very nice place. We will definitely come back. Nice location, quiet and close to the center.
Beautiful apartment, very clean and well furnished. Communication with host was very smooth and easy.
Good apartment, clean, spacious, modern, with everything you need. Good location, quiet neighborhood and close to central area.
We booked for a 3 night stay for December, I cancelled in August due to travel restrictions and they would not refund my deposit.
The best experience ever. The interior design was pretty good. Thanks Gaurav for all the help.
Very good location and convenient check in. The apartment is very comfortable. The host is very helpful and quick to respond.
The right accommodation for a great holiday. We are grateful for the help. Highly recommend.
Apartment was nice and central, great for a trip to Antwerp. Great host.
Nice clean apartment, plenty of room, very relaxing and a great spot to commute.
We stayed in the apartment and still have not received the security deposit back. Terrible communication.
A very good flat in Antwerpen. You will enjoy your stay.
Great place, modern, very clean and comfortable, very helpful and kind staff.
Clean and spacious space. My family and I had a lovely stay in Antwerp.
The apartment was pretty good. It was very clean and everything was fine. I will come back again.
Very nice staff and very nice apartments and very clean. The service was also 5 stars.
Great apartment, everything you need and really spacious.
We had a very pleasant stay. The rooms were nice and tidy. We will recommend this to others.
Host was very kind with helping me check in.
This place is really comfortable and clean. I love it.
We stayed here and it was excellent.
Thank you for the nice stay.
Amazing, thanks for all.
Amazing stay with professional staff.
Wonderful.
Thanks for all the help.
Very nice. Markets and restaurants nearby.
Super.
Its a good place.
Large apartment and clean, but furniture was very basic and some items were non-functional. Balcony door did not seal properly. No response to a party above. Not worth the price.
Great apartment in the Jewish quarter. Big living space with lots of light and three terraces. Tram stops are nearby and a small supermarket is close. Tourist tax request came a day before arrival.
We stayed with four people. Everything was clean and present. Towels and made beds with shampoo for showering. Spacious bathroom with bathtub and shower. Walking distance to the city.
Great apartment for 6 people, comfortable, clean and spacious. Quiet and safe area, with nearby supermarkets. Parking option available. Host was always available and helpful.
Great accommodation and great host. Fast responses and really there for you.
Perfect vacation. Great apartment in the center of Antwerp. Very friendly host and clean apartment.
Super nice, luxurious and large apartment. Great that a crib and high chair were arranged.
Apartment is perfect and appears recently renovated. Check-in instructions were delayed and we waited in the rain. The area is quiet and tram is nearby.
Penthouse apartment in a quiet street. Clean and cozy with great beds. Kitchen has many appliances, though a teapot and breadboard were missing. Self check-in worked well.
Spacious apartment with balcony in quiet neighborhood near city park. Supermarket close by. 15 minutes walk to shopping center or central station.
Very friendly people, always willing to help.
Very good apartment in a recommended area, quiet and close to the center. Very clean and attentive team.
Spacious apartment with kitchen near the best part of Antwerp. Without reception, but great help from host.
Large, beautiful and tidy apartment. Lots of dishes and glassware. TV works well with Netflix and YouTube. Beds are good, bathrooms spacious. Quiet and easy to reach center by tram.
A very pleasant stay in a spacious apartment, ideal for families. Complete kitchen and large bathroom. Located near a grocery store.
Nice apartments, clean and good location relative to the center. Friendly host.
Reservation accepted and paid, but on arrival we were told the apartment was occupied and moved across town. Promised compensation never received.
Do not book. Deposit not returned. Unreachable by phone or email.
Apartment was ok, but charged for a key issue that was not our fault. Felt like a scam.
Booked for a weekend. Beautiful, large apartment and easy check-in. Highly recommended.
Malafide organization. Good stay but deposit of 250 EUR not returned after months.
We stayed with family and the stay was great. Close to tram stops that connect to the center and central station.
Very satisfied with this apartment in the center. Very nice and clean. Everything is present.
The apartment is very spacious and bright. Kitchen is equipped, beds are very comfortable and the attention is quick and friendly.
Great stay, everything was perfect. Thanks for the welcome, responsiveness and kindness.
Very well located accommodation. Self check-in worked well. Simply equipped but clean.
A sweet little apartment in a great location. Parking was no problem.
Very nice accommodation and convenient. Host was very helpful.
We were very satisfied. Rooms were clean.
Nice centrally located apartment including parking.
Perfect. Loved it.
Top, nothing to say.
Rooms 4, Service 3, Location 3.
Trip type: Vacation.
Trip type: Vacation. Travel group: Friends.
